3. A potometer with a leafy shoot weighed 18.9g initially and weighed 17.9g after one hour. From this it follow that
optionA: the shoot absorbed 1g of water per hour
optionB: 1g of water per hour evaporates from the potometer
optionC: the shoot lost 1g of water per hour
optionD: the shoot was respiring and lost weight at rate of 1g per hour
answer: the shoot lost 1g of water per hour
